title: Bill, Hillary, and the Lolita Express
author: VD
content_html:
So, in light of the pretty serious claims the guy is making, I looked him up before posting a link to this video. Based on his Infogalactic page, he’s a pretty serious guy, albeit a controversial one. The highlights:
  • Harvard psychiatrist
  • MIT PhD
  • Deputy Assistant Secretary of State under Henry Kissinger, Cyrus Vance and James Baker.
  • Former Council on Foreign Relations member
  • 9/11 and Sandy Hook conspiracy theorist.
In other words, he’s Deep State and a genuine, if rogue, member of the intelligence community. So, if he’s now willing to make open claims about Hillary being a lesbian pedophile with ties to Epstein and the Lolita Express, this is a pretty strong sign that the NYPD and the FBI already have the evidence of her crimes.

The rumors are getting crazier and crazier, and yet remain somehow consistent:

There are three files that are in the folder labeled “Life Insurance” , one of which is called ‘DNC Nuclear Arsenal’. The second file is labeled ‘Intimate XXX’, which contains naked pictures of Huma Abedin, Hillary Clinton, and a teenage girl having sex.  The Third file was not mentioned.

The FBI set up a sting against the Department of Justice (DOJ).  The sting set up Bill Clinton and Attorney General Loretta Lynch in Phoenix, Arizona which they had a secret meeting on the tarmac of Mrs. Lynch’s airplane.  FBI workers leaked information to Bill Clinton that Loretta Lynch was going to be at the airport in Phoenix.  This is how Bill Clinton knew that AG Lynch was going to be at the airport at that specific time and date.

Speculation now is that the FBI and Department of Justice are now in an internal war about the leaks of the new emails found on Huma’s and Anthony Wiener’s computer.   Many people are connected with the latest email scandal as the Obama administration personnel were using private emails servers outside of the sanctioned government servers.  They were passing classified information though private emails.  Senators, Representatives, and lobbyists, including John Podesta, and Huma. The emails revealed that they were communicating with media broadcast companies NBC, ABC, CBS for the purpose of denying the American people from using the Freedom Information Act/ FOIA Requests of the private emails from Hillary and Huma’s computer.  The whole thing is setup under a code name called “SOCIGA3301”.

Obviously, I cannot vouch for any of this. I am not privy to the files. I am not saying it is true. I am simply conveying the information that others are now reporting.
